text: I’m starting to question the nature of my reality… I’m trying to run a helloworld-go container with Knative in K8s in Docker desktop on Mac. And it’s complaining that `Ingress has not yet been reconciled`. <https://www.ingress.com>

attachments.title: Ingress Prime – Ingress Prime
attachments.text: The discovery of Exotic Matter (XM), a mysterious energy, has divided mankind into two Factions. Choose your side and band together to explore this strange world - and maybe even control it.
attachments.fallback: Ingress Prime: Ingress Prime – Ingress Prime

elements.text: I’m starting to question the nature of my reality… I’m trying to run a helloworld-go container with Knative in K8s in Docker desktop on Mac. And it’s complaining that
Ingress has not yet been reconciled

text: Guess I have to read some of the manuals. :scream:
